snippet: An Indian court ordered on Monday that two Italian marines who were accused of killing two Indian fishermen last month be moved to a jail from a guest house while officials investigate.
abstract: Indian court orders that two Italian marines accused of killing two Indian fishermen be moved to a jail from a guest house while officials investigate; Italian government has argued Italy should investigate and calls the decision 'unacceptable'.
lead_paragraph: An Indian court ordered on Monday that two Italian marines who were accused of killing two Indian fishermen last month be moved to a jail from a guest house while officials investigate.

headline.seo: India: Italians Jailed in Two Deaths
headline.main: India: Italians Jailed in Two Deaths
headline.print_headline: India: Italians Jailed in Two Deaths
